data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: One of the most important steps to a successful print job is determining the right grade for your job. The ____ factors ____ quality, money, and ____ of ____. For ____, ____ that ____ a ____ `` ____ '' ( such ____ a ____ poster ____ flyer ) are ____ printed ____ basic ____ good ____. Everything in a package should be the same quality.
data.partBlankContent: One of the most important steps to a successful print job is determining the right grade for your job. The deter______ factors a__ quality, money, and ty__ of j__. For inst____, it___ that ha__ a sh___ `` life____ '' ( such a_ a promo______ poster o_ flyer ) are typi_____ printed o_ basic o_ good gr___. Everything in a package should be the same quality.
data.answer: 成功打印工作最重要的步骤之一是确定适合您的工作的等级。决定因素是质量、金钱和工作类型。例如，“使用寿命”较短的物品(如促销海报或传单)通常以基本等级或良好等级印刷。包装中的所有东西都应该是相同的质量。
